name: sked-runner
description: Sked runners for picking up schedules, checking if their conditions are being met and then executing associated AMQP workflows.

scripts.tag: docker tag $npm_package_name:v$npm_package_version-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) $npm_package_config_registry/$npm_package_name:v$npm_package_version-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.prep: npm run build && npm run tag && npm run push
